alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Guadalupe County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 30 at 11:45AM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected, shifting west and then northwesterly overnight into Friday morning. * WHERE...Central Highlands and Guadalupe County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may cause lowered visibility on area highways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This High Wind Warning is extended through Friday, replacing the High Wind Watch.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles.
